monogr.title: The forme and maner of examination befoir the admission to ye tabill of ye Lord, vsit be ye ministerie of Edinburgh : and geuin to ye maisteris of euerie familie not be ye oft reiding yairof yai may be ye better instructit in ye groundis [and] principall heidis of religion

div.p: To ye Maisteris and houshalderis in Edinburgh grace and peice be multiplyit.

THe cair of the kirk, & Ministerie hes bene and is sic towardis ʒow (deir brether in ye Lord) yat for ʒour caus ordour hes bene tane to teiche the principall heidis of religioun in four seuerall placis ilk sonday, for ye instruction of all in general, & to teiche ʒour ʒouth in ye scule in ye same heidis, as in a maist necessar doctrine. And now besydes all yis, we offer vnto ʒow yis schort treatise, contening in effect ye groundis of ane christiane religion. Ernistlie desyring ʒow in ye Name of Christ Iesus to reid, or caus ye same be red diligentlie in ʒour houses, for ye instructiō of ʒour sel uis, ʒour childrē & seruandis, yat thay may be ye mair abil to answer quhen yai sall be examinat. In sa doing (deir brether) ʒe sal follow ye guid exapill of Abrahā, quha is commēdit of ye Lord, in yat he instructit his houshald. Ʒour consciencis also heirby sal be ye better dischargit, & ʒe sall heip vp blissingis in ʒour houses, to ʒour comfort, & ye glorie of ʒour God, quha mot incres ʒow in trew godlines, & roul ʒour hartis euer in his trew feir.
